CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 11, 1954, page 1, reads: "Courier Photog Escapes Killer - The lens of Courier photographer, Charles (Teenie) Harris, caught this action of confessed sex-killer William (Buttons) Cole, center, shortly before Cole chased Harris several yards in the Criminal Courtroom corridor Monday at noontime. Deputy Sheriff Walt Kemmerer, right, and an unidentified sheriff, halted Cole's would-be assault as Harris prepared to turn his camera into a defense weapon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two sheriffs, including Deputy Walt Kemmerer, right, escort William "Buttons" Cole through corridor of the Allegheny County Courthouse after confessing to murder
